data.name: Harvest VR
data.description:
It's a beautiful day out here in the countryside. Might as well enjoy it doing your job. Grow some plants, sell some veggies, or head to town to buy some new tools for the farm.

Our goal is to release regular content updates, new mechanics, and tweaks to existing systems based on community feedback and discussions, so we would love for you to join us on our discord and help us shape this game!

https://discord.gg/mM2UsAF

Features
Enjoy the countryside.
Grow more than 15 different kinds of plants.
Sell vegetables to gain money and buy new tools.
Work hard or hardly work.
Save the game inside your house.
Do some fishing.
Do some mining.
Do some cooking.
Play with real time OR play with a faster simulated time.
Unlock items for your house or the farm!
Climb some trees and pick some apples.

Features
* Version is now shown in the main menu so everyone can easily see which version they are on.

Bug fixes
* Animals(dead or alive) can now be removed again.
* Pressing the oculus button repeatedly no longer crashes the game.
* Time on your watch will no longer have a pause every 3 seconds.

Features
- HUGE graphical update. Lights are now baked into the scenes causing lot's of shadows to also show up in the distance.
- HUGE performance improvements. (from 45fps to around 70fps).
- Running now only requires a click of the joystick instead of holding it down.
- The chest in the shed now shares storage with other locations (farm, mine, ranch, home).
- Added 2 more pages to the shared chest.
- Increased resolution for tooltips.
- Tooltip now works from both hands. You can use tooltips per hand now.
- Added setting: refresh rate switcher (72, 80, 90, 120).
- Added setting: toggle fog.
- Windows are now reflective.
- Portals now nicely fade in particles when moving close instead of instantly.
- Made item grabbing feel way more snappy. (Can't explain, try it).
- Resized talk dialog to fit multiple quests
- Broken save files now nicely show an error to see whats up.
- Added parkouring on lantern poles & fences
- Replaced night lights with fake lights for optimal performance.
- Updated two-handed item mechanics + physics.

0.1.2
Update overview

Complete color overhaul!
Modular Mine!
Fishing 2.0
Recipes 2.0
beehives
New plants
New quests
Archery minigame
Skin color changing
Under the hood
Complete colour overhaul
We completely changed the coloring of Harvest VR. Previously each object would have 1 color. But this has been changed so that now little gradients are found on each and every object. Also this helps us a LOT for performance since we only have a single pallette to colour everything!

Modular Mine!
The mine has been rebuild from the ground up and is now different every time you enter!

Fishing 2.0
You can now fish for some new fish using fishing lures! Those lures will have you catch 4 new kinds of fish + we've added the ability to catch boots!

Recipes 2.0
Recipes has been completely revamped! Each recipe now has it's own separate view + an overview page to scroll through the recipes + since we have some new fish we

Beehives
Added beehives! You can buy them from the animal store. They give you lots of honey!

New Plants
Ofcourse what is a new Harvest VR update without any new Harvest! Here are some new plants.

Blueberry
Raspberry
Saguaro Cactus
Opuntia Cactus
New Quests
Simplified questing mechanics for us to create cool quests for you! We've added 4 new quests for you to complete.

Cleanup Crew
Shell Finder
Archery minigame
We added a fun little minigame for archers. Now you dont have to wait for hunting to actually use the bow!

Skin color changing
You can now change the color of your skin! We added few basic colors but let us know if you like some more!

Other cool changes
Added some grass to the farmable lands if no plants are planted.
Redesign of flowers
Flowers are now animated
Added nightlights to the beach.
Added a mirror as buyable item for you house.
Added 3 kinds of clams to the beach.
Added 7 new pixel art to the art store.
Added new pixelated icons to the world map.
Added an indicator to "plant of the week" to see how long you still have.
New models for the ores.
Made milk buckets stackable.
Balanced coconut selling price.
Changed text for plants growing to "days left"
Increased default deadzone
Added a "are you sure?" dialog for people deleting their animals.
Under the hood
This might be less interesting for you! But we've completely redone most of Harvest VR's core mechanics. We've redone, NPC's dialoging, item/store/fishing/plants organising, added testing, added test coverage, and a LOT(and I mean really, a LOT) more. This results in making the game more stable, more easy to continue building on, AND more fun for us to work on!

Bug Fixes
Fixed the loud background tutorial music.
Fixed a bug where you could duplicate the backpacks by snapping it to the basket.
Fixed a bug where the vending machine would give the item below the one selected.
Fixed a bug where multiple saves would overlamp.
Fixed a bug where modern lamp would be saved as default lamp
Fixed vending machine lever near the fishing pond wouldn't move.
Fixed a bug where red mushrooms let you fly.
Fixed a bug where NPC dialog would sometimes not appear.
Quests where remove on new game. Give errors when progressing in quests.
Fixed a bug where buying a fishing rod for the first time shows white line.
Probably a shitload more due to the enormous core changes.
Fixed multiple seed for 1 patch bug.
Fixed bugs where watered seeds would not grow to next stage.
Fixed fall through terrain on the edge of the beach.
Fixed fall in river near the village.
Added more invalid teleport areas on cliffs on beach.
Added more invalid teleport areas on high land on farm.
Fixed teleporting into collection bin.
NPC look bubbles will now longer collide with teleporting.
Falling through the mine will now let you auto respawn at start.
New game SHOULD now always pick the correct time option.
Fishing Rod will now remember the last item that was on your hook when you drop it and respawn it if grab the fishing rod again. (only in same lvl, it is NOT a place to stash stuff).
Ignore player colliders near face to stop screenfading
Scroll sensitivity on vending machine
Scroll scrollbar color on vending machine
Fixed plants + oven buttons showing when kitchen is not bought.
